title: Bug 4121 - JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: Open the project in the parent directory. Export the project as a jar file and save it in the same directory. Overwrite the exported jar file. An out of sync message will be displayed.
EB: The exported JAR should not trigger an 'out of sync' message when overwritten multiple times in the same directory.
SR: The exported jar should not cause an out of sync message when being overwritten in the same directory. The exported jar file should replace the previous version without any errors or notifications.
